1.circuitous: do something different for a day

2.circuitous: change the bass part for the lead

3.circuitous: remove the bass track, slow x2 speed

4.circuitous: no emotional feeling, delete track or all tracks

5.circuitous: reverse and chop tracks up a bit

6.circuitous: keep high and lows remove all mid

8.circuitous: use an unexpected effect on an instrument

9.circuitous: emotions are more important than code

10.circuitous: if your not feeling it, leave it for now

11.circuitous: if the track sounds wrong, delete it

13.circuitous: imagination is not an after thought

14.circuitous: nature has a library of rhythms

21.circuitous: delete everything, start again move forward

22.circuitous: blur detail, make a tonal change

23.circuitous: focus on the mistakes, delete the rest

25.circuitous: if it sounds wrong, go back to the start

26.circuitous: reuse an old idea, make it your own

27.circuitous: change the words to fit the melody

28.circuitous: sometimes listen to advice, sometimes do not
change static sections to dynamic movement

29.circuitous: when you have nothing to say, say it

30.circuitous: try not to revisit, better to start again

31.circuitous: who is the audience, would they buy it?

32.circuitous: if bored from listening?, delete, move forward

33.circuitous: nothing says nothing, more than nothing

34.circuitous: if the mistake sounds better keep it

35.circuitous: life is boring sometimes, art is always drama

36.circuitous: write down the problem, check in the morning

37.circuitous: remove the main theme, share it

38.circuitous: doing nothing, is better than racing into doubt

39.circuitous: the least important thing, maybe the most
